- Knowledge of Agile process frameworks would be beneficial, with an understanding of how QA fits within agile development cycles to facilitate quick iterations and continuous improvement. 
- Ability to troubleshoot complex software workflows, identifying and resolving issues systematically. 
- Experience using SQL to write queries for validating data in databases, demonstrating an ability to engage with technical data validation tasks. 
- Willingness to grow and learn new skills, particularly in the area of automated testing. A desire to expand one's skill set and adapt to new technologies and methodologies is crucial.

- You are a fan of the speed and agility of startups, having worked at one or more before, including perhaps your own.
- You have experienced developing best-in-class mobile and web apps, as well as monitoring and supporting them in production.

- - Two code interviews (~1 hour each)
